2.0.name: wordpress/stop-acta
2.0.description: A black ribbon with the words "Stop ACTA" will be put on in the top right corner of your website, linking to the http://www.referendumacta.pl/website. Look at the screenshots to see how the ribbon looks. Check out the Help Stop SOPA/PIPA entry in the WordPress news too. Thank you for showing your support!
